General.Name: Minehub Technologies Inc
General.Description: Minehub Technologies Inc. develops and operates block-chain technology platform for digital trade in the mining and metals supply chain and related enterprise solutions. The company's MineHub platform connects the buyers, sellers, and financiers, which are involved in physical commodities transactions in a digitally integrated workflow. Minehub Technologies Inc. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 717-1030 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2Y3

4.Name: Mr. Gavin John Cooper C.A., C.F.A., CA, CPA
